techmeme.title: Digital bank Tyme Group, which operates in South Africa and the Philippines, raised a $250M Series D led by Brazilian digital bank Nubank at a $1.5B valuation (Bloomberg)
Waymo plans to test its robotaxis in Tokyo in early 2025, its first international expansion, with partners taxi operator Nihon Kotsu and taxi hailing app GO (CNBC)
Mark Zuckerberg says Threads now has 100M+ DAUs, revealing its DAU count for the first time, and 300M+ MAUs, up from 275M+ MAUs in Q3 2024 (Jay Peters/The Verge)
Source: Trump meets with TikTok CEO Shou Zi Chew at Mar-a-Lago, the same day that the company asks the Supreme Court to block the law that could ban the app (NBC News)
Copenhagen-based Keepit, which offers SaaS data protection and backup services, raised $50M led by One Peak and Denmark's EIFO, taking its total raised to $90M (Eduard Kovacs/SecurityWeek)
